entry.title: A Rabbi Searches for a Congregation in Saudi Arabia, Birthplace of Islam
entry.content: Jacob Herzog wants to offer religious services to Jewish expats. So far, the kingdom isn’t interested, but he’s undaunted; ‘Have to make a leap of faith.’

entry.title: Tariffs to Tackle Climate Change Gain Momentum. The Idea Could Reshape Industries.
entry.content: Wealthy nations are proposing tariffs on imports like steel and cement that result in high carbon emissions. The proposals could boost U.S. manufacturers—but could also undermine world trade rules and even trigger trade disputes.
